mdRecord.dcterms:title: University of Virginia Conference on Federal Taxation
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R. [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on back: Left to right: David A. Lindsay, New York attorney and lecturer at opening day of the 13th Annual Virginia Conference on Federal Taxation, Thursday, June 22, 1961; T. Grayson Maddrea, Richmond accountant and co-chairman of the conference; Carl E. Davis, Richmond attorney and another co-chairman; Peter Manson, Law school Professor at the University of Virginia, representative of the Conference. Conference held in Newcomb Hall. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
